title: Sonos Reports Progress Made Against Climate Action Plan, Showcases Commitment to Product Longevity and ... - Yahoo Finance
summary: Sonos released its 2023 Listen Better Report, showcasing their efforts towards environmental sustainability, social impact, and diversity. The company aims for carbon neutrality by 2030, with products designed using sustainable materials and practices, including significant use of recycled plastics. Sonos has launched new speakers that incorporate energy-efficient designs and eco-conscious packaging, while also supporting various philanthropic initiatives. Their commitment extends to transparency regarding greenhouse gas emissions and promoting better practices in diversity and inclusion.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article details Sonos' efforts in building environmentally sustainable products and processes, including achieving carbon neutrality, using recycled materials, and implementing energy-efficient product designs.
business_innovation: TRUE - The introduction of new audio products that significantly innovate in both function and design showcases Sonos' commitment to business innovation.
green_product: TRUE - The new Sonos Era 100 and Era 300 speakers are designed to reduce energy consumption and incorporate recycled materials, aligning them with the definition of green products.
